item.title: Add a React form with Formspree
item.description: Add a React form with Formspree Last reviewed: November 30, 2021 Almost every React website needs a form to collect user data. Formspree External link icon Open external link is a back-end service that handles form processing and storage, allowing developers to include forms on their website without writing server-side code or functions.

item.title: Create a HTML form
item.description: Create a HTML form Last reviewed: July 28, 2022 In this tutorial, you will create a simple <form> using plain HTML and CSS and deploy it to Cloudflare Pages. While doing so, you will learn about some of the HTML form attributes and how to collect submitted data within a Worker.
